attributes.action: require newspaper story corrections & retractions to have the same page space as the original articles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Newspapers regularly print inaccurate / misleading stories, and these are often given large amounts of "column inches" even if the papers have done nothing to check the authenticity of the subject matter. I believe that where they need to print any major corrections, retractions, or are found to have breached the PCC code, they should be forced to give these the same prominence as the original articles. I believe this would lead to more accurate reporting of issues, and lessen the instances of often hurtful, baseless reporting of people's private lives.
